com.adsboard.controller

Class UserController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.adsboard.controller.UserController

  • @Controller
public class UserController
extends java.lang.Object
    Project Ads board. This Controller class is used for control of pages /myads and /register and /account Implements the display and CRUD operations with users
    Since:
    October 30, 2015
    Author:
    Oleksandr Lukichov
